physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Left wrist varus deformity; radial articular angle: 40 degrees, carpal slip: 50%, ulnar shortening: 14 mm.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, radial articular angle improved to 18 degrees, carpal slip improved to 10%, ulnar shortening decreased to 5 mm at 8 years follow-up. Growth plate trend toward premature closure noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Right wrist varus deformity; right radial head dislocation; radial articular angle: 35 degrees, carpal slip: 55%, ulnar shortening: 22 mm.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, radial articular angle improved to 30 degrees, carpal slip improved to 50% at 1 year follow-up. No pain or limited range of motion reported, and no cases of recurrence or ulnar shortening.
